My name is Paweł Szybaj. I'm 26 years old and in the last couple of months my passion became programming. I educate myself towards creating clean, easy to enlargement code. I always try to make my projects look good on various devices. I'm interested in both front-end and back-end. I strive to create websites and applications fully functional on server-side and client.
